price: 17. Sepan que Al-lah reaviva la tierra tras su muerte. Les hemos explicado con claridad las pruebas (de Nuestro poder) para que razonen.
arabic: ٱعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُحۡيِ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ بَعۡدَ مَوۡتِهَاۚ قَدۡ بَيَّنَّا لَكُمُ ٱلۡأٓيَٰتِ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَعۡقِلُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: iʿ'lamū anna al-laha yuḥ'yī al-arḍa baʿda mawtihā qad bayyannā lakumu al-āyāti laʿallakum taʿqilūna
